item.title: Obfuscation
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: The goal of this challenge is to reverse this highly obfuscated binary and get the correct passphrase Explanation The program asks for a passphrase, because of that and the name of the program I assumed there would some passphrase obfuscated, so I decompiled it : Couldn’t understand anything so I checked if maybe it was packed ? Nope, okay we’ll let’s use BinaryNinja then : 93A3 is our function, so let’s set a breakpoint at the start of it and see what happens to our input :

item.title: BlackHatMEA 2024 - RD What Now?
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: I have some files missing but I think I can figure it out anyways. Explanation Typical “Z3 solver/whole lotta conditions” challenge, but written in R. We start with a file that contains a bunch of zlib files. We can use binwalk to extract these files. The files contain a bunch of non sense and couple strings like 0.0.9000, quick google search and we find that it has something to do with R :

item.title: BlackHatMEA 2024 - Stealer
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: We received a phishing email within which we have found this file. We believe this executable acts as some sort of credential stealer. Note: This is a defused real malware, consider disabling your AV. Explanation The file is a .Net 32-bit executable, therefore we can use DnSpy to decompile it. You’ll find that it’s a bunch of obfuscated code, so we’ll use a tool called de4dot to clean our code.

item.title: AmateursCTF 2024 - Less suspicious RSA
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: I need help factoring this modulus, it looks less suspicious, but I can’t factor using any conventional methods.

item.title: AmateursCTF 2024 - Typo

item.description: can you make sure i didn’t make a typo?

item.title: AmateursCTF 2024 - Unsuspicious RSA

item.description: I need help factoring this modulus, it looks suspicious, but I can’t factor using any conventional methods.

item.title: Cygenix CTF 2024 - Classic
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: Every vulnerability is a door, and some doors lead to treasures.

item.title: Cygenix CTF 2024 - Gadgets
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: Even the strongest defenses have cracks; find them.

item.title: HTB Cyber-Apocalypse 2024 - Colored Squares
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: In the heart of an ancient forest stands a coloured towering tree, its branches adorned with countless doors. Each door, when opened, reveals a labyrinth of branching paths, leading to more doors beyond. As you venture deeper into the maze, the forest seems to come alive with whispered secrets and shifting shadows. With each door opened, the maze expands, presenting new choices and challenges at every turn. Can you understand what’s going on and get out of this maze?
